prompt: I need live transcribing while using online streaming or watching videos.

hidden_queries: live transcription for online streaming or videos real time captioning software
how to get live captions while watching videos on computer streaming
metadata.generated_search_query: live transcription for online streaming or videos real time captioning software

sources.title: Use live captions to better understand audio - Microsoft Support
sources.snippet: When using a Copilot+ PC, live captions instantly translate any live or pre-recorded video in any app or video platform from over 40 languages into English and 27 languages into Chinese (Simplified). Live captions works across Windows 11, making it seamless to read captions while working in other apps.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are reliable ways to get live transcription/captions while streaming or watching videos in real time: 1) Built-in system features Windows 11 Live Captions – shows live captions for any audio/video on your system (apps, streams, browsers) once enabled. Works across the OS and can be customized. Microsoft Support+1
Chrome Live Captions – built into Google Chrome; captions for any web audio/video playing in the browser. How-To Geek+1

sources.title: Android Is Now Using AI to Upgrade Your Phone's Closed Captions
sources.snippet:
Google is enhancing Android and Pixel devices with new features, prominently including AI-powered accessibility upgrades. The standout update is the introduction of "Expressive Captions," an enhancement to the Live Caption feature, which now includes descriptors for tone and non-verbal sounds like [sighs], [gasps], and [APPLAUSE], all processed locally without requiring cloud access. These improvements cater especially to deaf and hard-of-hearing users, and work across various apps, including during video calls.

Additional improvements include AI-driven image descriptions in the Lookout app for users with low vision, now powered by Gemini 1.5 Pro. Gemini’s integration with third-party apps expands its functionality, such as controlling Spotify, smart devices, and camera functions. Google is also rolling out smarter document scanning in Drive, a simpler sharing method via QR codes through Quick Share, and user-tailored AI responses via “Saved info with Gemini.”

For Pixel phones, enhanced features include a more interactive Call Screen, audio clean-up tools in the Recorder app, improved song recognition with Now Playing, new theft protection via Identity Check, and systemwide UI and usability improvements. Pixel Watch and Fitbit users also benefit from expanded access to health-tracking features like Daily Readiness and Cardio Load.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Android Live Caption – similar AI captioning on phones, works across apps and media. WIRED

sources.title: Live Transcribe for Free - Transcribe Audio in Real Time
sources.snippet: Transcribe live audio for free in more than 125 languages. Share live transcripts, integrate real-time AI transcription into your workflow and more.

citation_mappings.claim_text: These don’t require special services; they transcribe audio as it plays. 2) Browser/online tools Maestra / Web Captioner-style tools – start a web caption session and point your mic/system audio to it; shows live text as the video plays. Some support translation too. Maestra AI+1
Speechlogger – real-time browser transcriber (speech → text). Speechlogger

sources.title: Live Subtitles – Bilingual Captions & Speech Translator
sources.snippet: Live Subtitles is an automatic real-time subtitle generator that converts any audio or video into text and live translation. The app instantly transcribes speech and displays bilingual subtitles, showing both the original language and the translated text at the same time. Subtitles appear as a floating overlay on top of any app — videos, calls, live streams, social media, podcasts, online ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) Apps that overlay live subtitles Live Subtitles (Microsoft Store app) – floats real-time captions over any app or video. Microsoft Store
Third-party live caption apps (some free or paid) can capture system audio and generate captions in real time. Notta

sources.title: Live Captioning & Real-Time Transcription Software | Verbit
sources.snippet: Live captioning provides real-time transcription of spoken content during live events, meetings and lectures, making the content accessible to audiences as it occurs.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 4) Pro/enterprise tools If you need professional accuracy or streamers want captions integrated into a broadcast: Real-time captioning services & platforms (like Verbit, Stage Captions, SyncWords, SubCaptioner) generate captions for live streams and events. SubCaptioner+3Verbit+3Stage Captions+3
These usually involve subscription or per-minute charges. Quick ways to start right now On your computer: Windows 11 → Settings → Accessibility → Captions → Turn on Live Captions. geeksforgeeks.org
Chrome → Settings → Advanced → Accessibility → Live Captions (or right-click media bar). Google Help
